featured.text: Wang Chien-ming, the Yankees’ best pitcher last year, already showed his great _____ for baseball when he was still a teenager.

definition.zh_def: 犬類動物，通常被人類飼養作為寵物或工作夥伴。
definition.en_def: A domesticated animal of the species Canis lupus familiaris, often kept as a pet or for work.
definition.example: My dog loves to play fetch in the park.
